summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to a team, attaching a draft letter concerning jury instructions for a case, likely related to the Epstein or associated matters. The document shows ongoing legal preparation by prosecutors.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, attaching a draft jury instructions letter for team review, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Draft Jury Instructions Letter Prepared
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney circulates a draft letter concerning jury instructions to their team for comments.

keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were actively working on jury instructions as of November 2021.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to the Epstein case or associated matters at that late date.
The communication is internal prosecutorial team correspondence regarding trial preparation.
